timeline.bodyText: minor: would drop this second empty newline
timeline.author: norosa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2428,6 +2428,31 @@ Example:
     SELECT 1 row in set (... sec)
 
 
+.. _obj_description:
+
+``obj_description(integer, text)``
+----------------------------------
+
+This function exists mainly for compatibility with PostgreSQL. In PostgreSQL it
+returns the comment for a database object. CrateDB doesn't support user defined
+comments for database objects, so it always returns ``null``. 
+
+

timeline.message:
Add the `pg_catalog.obj_description` scalar function

It is used by the PostgreSQL JDBC client if using
`conn.getMetaData().getUDTs(...)`

Add the `pg_catalog.obj_description` scalar function

It is used by the PostgreSQL JDBC client if using
`conn.getMetaData().getUDTs(...)`
